snippet: The Obama administration has hired Equifax Workforce Solutions to help verify information provided on subsidy applications under the new health care law.
abstract: Obama administration hires credit reporting agency Equifax Workforce Solutions to verify incomes of people who apply for federal subsidies to buy insurance under new health care law; use of commercial information vendor comes as Congressional Republicans are expressing concern about administration's ability to verify data in subsidy applications.
lead_paragraph: The Obama administration has hired Equifax Workforce Solutions to help verify information provided on subsidy applications under the new health care law.

headline.main: Credit Reporting Agency Hired to Verify Incomes for Insurance Subsidies
headline.print_headline: Credit Reporting Agency Hired to Verify Incomes For Insurance Subsidies

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
